name: Mashed Potato Blues
description: These mashed potatoes may be singing the blues, but you won't be!

ingredients.name: russet, baking or Yukon Gold potatoes

preparation: Place potatoes in Multipurpose Pot and cover with cold water.
Bring to a gentle boil and cook approximately 20 minutes, or until tender but still retaining shape.
Drain and mash thoroughly. Beat in butter, milk and Creamy Ranch Dip Mix until well combined and fluffy.
Season with Salt and Pepper. Stir in blue cheese.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!
